idea-plugin.name: Xscriptor Theme
idea-plugin.description:
A modern theme collection for Android Studio/IntelliJ with both dark and light variants. Features clean contrast, vivid accents, and a focused, minimal UI. Includes bundled editor color schemes for both themes.
• Dark Theme: Deep blacks with purple/blue accents for comfortable coding in low-light environments • Light Theme: Clean whites with inverted color palette maintaining the same visual hierarchy • Both themes include matching editor color schemes optimized for syntax highlighting
idea-plugin.change-notes: 1.0.1 — Added light theme variant with matching editor color scheme. Both dark and light themes now available. Update repo. 1.0.0 — Initial release with full UI theme and editor scheme.
